subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amare Stoudemire has learned to master his body from the inside out since returning from microfracture surgery on his left knee in October 2005 and arthroscopic surgery on his right knee last April.
snippet: Amare Stoudemire has learned to master his body from the inside out since returning from microfracture surgery on his left knee in October 2005 and arthroscopic surgery on his right knee last April.
